settings.title: What makes this dog bed ideal for vet clinics and boarding facilities?
settings.text: Our Fused Core™ Utility Mattress is built specifically for high-traffic, mess-prone environments. It resists scratching, digging, moisture, and harsh cleaners—while still offering orthopedic comfort for aging or post-op pets.

settings.title: Is the bed really waterproof and easy to clean?
settings.text: Yes—thanks to our single-piece design, RF-welded seams, and hydrophobic air valve, the bed is 100% waterproof and blocks fluids and odors. Just spray and wipe clean—no cover or laundering needed.

settings.title: Can the bed be used outdoors or in kennels?
settings.text: Absolutely. Crafted from heavy-duty tarpaulin fabric, this bed is designed to withstand the elements, whether it's placed indoors, outside, or in crates. It's perfect for both lounging and heavy-duty daily use.

settings.title: Is it safe and comfortable for recovering or senior dogs?
settings.text: Yes. The orthopedic foam provides joint support and comfort, especially important for aging pets or those recovering from surgery. And because the mattress repels moisture, it helps maintain a hygienic rest surface.

settings.title: Do I need a separate bed cover?
settings.text: No cover is required. This mattress is designed to perform on its own. But if you want an added layer of softness with serious durability, our optional “Beast” cover is the perfect tough-and-cozy upgrade.

settings.title: Will it fit in my standard crates?
settings.text: Yes. Our beds are crate-friendly and available in standard sizes: 36", 42", and 48". Just choose the corresponding size for a snug, secure fit.
